tagline: Bridges quantitative market data with qualitative customer understanding to inform real business decisions.
pros: Rigorous methodology that produces trustworthy market sizing and segmentation
Expert survey and interview design that avoids common bias traps
Always connects findings to specific business decisions
cons: Insists on methodology alignment before starting, which can feel slow
Primary research capabilities are design-focused, not execution (can't run actual surveys)
May push back on research requests that lack clear decision context

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
